projects.description: Are you looking for motivation or encouragement to accomplish your goals and dreams?  Check out this simple random motivational quote generator where you can find inspiration and life quotes.  Quotes are randomly displayed every 10 seconds or when you press the “Motivate!” button.

This application dynamically paginates a given list of students.  Ten students are displayed at a time and the remaining students are accessible through the bottom navigation bar which displays additional page links. This coding application can be applied to an organization’s directory, contact list, or client list.

I developed this interactive form to validate user input dynamically once a user clicks submit. This allows the organization to improve data collection and can be applied to various other applications.
Want to test your 80’s pop culture knowledge? You can do just that with this fun and quirky 80’s Hangman game.  This game functions on the paradigm of Object Oriented Programming.
An employee directory is created asyncronously by requesting data from a public API using AJAX.
This is a server side application intended to showcase projects.  It contains a homepage, about me page and project descriptions.  It's the webpage you are currently visiting.

Want to see fan favorite images of your favorite Avenger? Or perhaps your favorite hero in general?  Here's the webpage for you!  This is an image search REACT application which pulls data from Flickr's API, parses the data and displays images returned from your search.  It contains navigation links of some of your favorite Avengers.

Are you a librarian needing an application to keep track of books in the library?  Here's a simplistic and straightforward application to do so.  The following application allows a library to create, read, update and delete books for their records.  Feel free to add your favorite books.

This is a REST API which allows teachers/administrators to handle course information.  Once a teacher creates an account they are able to create new courses which are linked to their unique id.  Teachers can update and delete only courses they have created.  Any teacher is able to retrive a full list of courses.  This application is intended for use by other applications such as web, iOS and Android applications to create, read, update and delete information from a unique Database.   /n/nThe following routes are accepted:/nGET /api/courses - Retreive a list of courses/nGET /api/courses/id/nPOST /api/courses/n PUT /api/courses/
